features: Front drip tray: The sponge holder for kitchen sink is equipped with a removable drip tray to prevent the drip from causing a clean work surface.The drip tray is drawn from the front, so it can be placed near the faucet to save space.It's easier and smoother than pulling it out from the side.The extra adhesive will also allow you to place the sink sponge holder on the wall.

Powerful storage: Innovative kitchen sink caddy organizer locker storage layout provide more space for your cleaning accessories than other sink caddy sponge holders. Our sponge rack is more flexible and convenient, perfecting for storing sponges, brushes, sink stoppers, dish soap, bottle and more. Make the sink table more clean and tidy.

Hollow bottom design : The bottom of kitchen sink sponge holder uses horizontal strips for draining, increasing the draining area and air flow speed,draining speed faster, can keep cleaning tools away from the dirty water in the sink.

Two ways to install: You can use the sink rack directly on the counter or using Extra Adhesive place the sink sponge holder on the wall. it can hold 20 pounds of smooth hard surfaces through our 5 year test. Just peel off the lid, stick the adhesive to the surface, and press thoroughly.

Special Stainless Steel: The sink sponge holder is made of purely splendid stainless steel. Durable material won’t become dented or cracked. Every kitchen sink caddy soap holder has been tested before shipping. You need a kitchen sink caddy brush holder to help you.

Customer Service：We summarize the deficiencies of the existing sink cradle in the market, and carefully design new dish sponge holder caddy to provide better product experience for customers. If you are not satisfied with any of our Soap Caddy Holder, please feel free to contact us, we will give you a reply within 24 hours and provide you with a satisfactory solution.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: VANTEN Sponge Holder Sink Organizer for your kitchen！ Why do you choose our VANTEN Kitchen Sink Organizer Caddy？ The first one is that our sink caddies with high bearing capacity. Can store most kitchen cleaning supplies & accessories. Proved to hold 15 lbs after 3 year testing on smooth hard surfaces. Multifunction kitchen sink caddy organizer with drain pan means Brush holder & Soap Dish holder &Sink Stopper Holder&Sponge holder

Are you tired of constantly scrubbing wet countertop and cleaning soap stains？ Perfect-Sized kitchen sink organizer sponge holder Modern shaped sink Organizer Cleaner is perfect for holding tall brushes, hand sanitizers,sponges, sink stopper, scrubbers, dish soap bottles. No scratches in the sink area Have you noticed that any scratches on the kitchen sink while using Sink Soap Sponge Holder? VANTEN sponge Organizer bracket is easy to clean, will not leave scratches on the countertop, the surface is smooth. Why do you choose us? Removable Front Drain Tray Powerful Storage Function Rustproof Widened Drain Design Quick Drying More Durable

Removable Drip Tray & Widened Drain Design Faster Drying Different from other Sponge Holder Organizer taking out from the Sink side, our drip tray is taken out from the front and can be placed next to the faucet to save space for you, and then the Sponge holder for kitchen sink design uses a horizontal way to improve the drainage speed and drainage area, so that the sponge，Soap Dispenser and Dish brush quickly keep dry.

Where to use: You can put the sink sponge holderon the counter and give yourself a clean, neat countertop.Beside you can use the adhesive install on such as tile,glass, wood,marble, metal, kitchen, sink or laundry room. DON'T adhesive on painted walls or wallpapers or it will take off your paint or wallpapers. How to remove: You can heat adhesive surface evenly with a hair dryer for 3 minutes, then you can easily tear off the installed adhesive without damaging the sink or wall . What You Will Get: 1X Sink Sponge Holder Organizer , 1 X ADHESIVEVANTEN state that our dish sponge holder is made of SUS 304 stainless steel which will not like these cheaper options that made of chrome or other steels that will rust within a few month.If there is any problem with the sink caddy kitchen sink organizer, we will send you a replacement free of charge without return.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as pictured
reviews.reviewText: It is the tray & holder for sponges, etc. it doesn’t say it comes with the soap holder, was negative comment about that. It is sturdy. Has the holder for the tray. Easy out & in, easy to clean. Looks nice on counter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best sink organizer ever!
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I wanted look just like the pictureI love the that it has the drip mat under that comes out easily for cleaning. Well made and good quality product. Compact and convenient, really frees up a lot of space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Why did I not know about these sooner. Looks so modern on my sink in black. No tipping over of hand soap and detergent or drops running from brillo pads and etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute holder for sink things!
reviews.reviewText: Just received this yesterday. It was packaged well and is cute on my counter. Soap dispenser, drain stopper and scrub brush fit well. The tray is plastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works well and help us to not have a mess in the sink

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: I initially had a caddy that attached to the inside of my sink. I hated that it took up some space and that it started to change color. This does the trick. It holds my sponge, hand soap, dish soap and bamboo brush neatly! The drainer rack is a nice addition to catch any water that is still on the objects.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great way to make your kitchen countertop look chic and current!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for something to corral all of my kitchen sink supplies and this little caddy is the perfect addition to my counter! It easily holds dish soap, strainers and cleaning sponges - plus it's really cute!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kitchen Sink Space Saver
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my soap and sponge and it’s perfect. Easy to clean, looks cute. Exactly what I was looking for!

reviews.reviewTitle: Handy scrubby and dish soap holder
reviews.reviewText: This its perfectly on the windowsill above the sink. It's just the right size to be useful without taking up too much space. Very pleased with it.

Lo bueno del producto es que se instala de manera rápida, no recomiendo poner cosas muy pesadas, en mi caso solo la uso para poner un jabón de manos y una botella de pasta, elProducto es sencillo y funcional, le doy un 10.

I'm super happy with this product. I love that it comes with its own drip tray so I can empty/clean it. I love that it fits my scrub daddy perfectly as well as my hand soap and dish soap. Really cleaned up my sink area!

Aunque no viene con orificios para instalar en pared, es sencillo hacerlos y queda de maravilla. Para poner la esponja que uno nunca sabe donde ponerla y hay que ponerla en un lugar donde se ventile por abajo, para evitar malos olores. Este es el producto ideal.
Great product since I don’t have a lot of room around my sink. Holds my sponge and sink stopper without being in the way.
